display_help: Discharges a Force Bomb that knocks down foes and deals Smashing Damage in a area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted Ally AoE), Foe Moderate DMG(Smash), Knockback
display_target_help: Discharges a Force Bomb that knocks down foes and deals Smashing Damage in a area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
display_target_short_help: Ranged (Targeted Ally AoE), Foe Moderate DMG(Smash), Knockback

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
